v8:item.v8:content: This report or data processor will connect to application in an unsafe mode! For detailed information on additional report and data processor connection modes to the application refer to form help menu.
This report or data processor will connect to application in safe mode. For detailed information on additional report and data processor connection modes refer to form help menu.
In the catalog and document item forms
Users the command is displayed to.
To view and modify the variants it is necessary to record an additional report by specifying "Is used" in the Publication field.

Decoration safe mode with permissions icon
Additional report or data processor will connect to application using "personal" security profile %1 which allows only following operations:

Additional report or data processor will connect to application without safe mode as Additional report or data processor correct performance requires execution of the following operations with external resources:
Additional report or data processor will connect to application in safe mode with additional permissions:

In order to "isolate" the opportunity to refer to external resources from additional report or data processor code only for above mentioned operations <link int://sp-on> security profile</> <link int://sp-on > shall be enabled</>. Thus "personal" security profile including permissions only for clearly approved operations and connection of additional report or data processor to the application without safe mode setting, will be created for additional report or data processors.
For detailed information on additional report and data processor connection modes refer to form help menu.
